text: transfer station compost collection amend rsa to read as follows transfer station means a solid waste collection storage and transfer facility which collects stores and transfers solid waste including waste and compost new paragraph town responsibility and authority solid waste management compost collection amend rsa by inserting after paragraph vi the following new paragraph a town may collect compostable materials at its transfer station or may contract upon a majority vote of its legislative body with the owners of a solid waste disposal facility which will collect compostable materials
